item.description:
Let's get together to have a nice run with what I've heard is a great view of the Connecticut River -- running across the Founders Bridge from Hartford over to East Hartford!  Why not have a great view of the Connecticut River while you train?

 

This is another meetup to get us practice in running with friends outside of an actual race.  It's meant to make running a fun social event, instead of just that day's exercise.  When running becomes fun, you'll be more inclined to do it!

 

I'm thinking of an out-and-back route from the boathouse at Riverside Park in Hartford south along a trail to the bridge, walk up the stairs, and run across the bridge to the East Hartford side, and then back.  It looks like that would only be about 2K.

 

 

There is free parking in Riverside Park.  Let's meet there outside the big boathouse at the river's edge.  Get directions here:  http://www.riverfront.org/contact/directions/#Riverside Please note that I don't have an address for this for your GPS.  DO NOT USE THE COLUMBUS AVENUE ADDRESS -- THAT WILL TAKE YOU TO ANOTHER LOCATION.  Follow the directions from the link above.  Call Chris at 860-204-2509 if you get lost or something.
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the riverside next to the big boathouse, near the boat launch.
item.name: Run together across the Connecticut River in Hartford!
